conversations.system:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
candidate_poll contains tables such as people.
Table people has columns such as people_id, sex, name, date_of_birth, height, weight.
conversations.query: List all people names in the order of their date of birth from old to young.
conversations.answer: select name from people order by date_of_birth;
